import React from "react"; function About() { return (

“You go through life wondering what is it all about life at the end of the day”

We provide a solution to the pairing problem. For the teachers, leaders,lectures and other groups who are involved in dealing with users or people, this system is for you. It allows you to automatically put people into pairs and keep track of the pairs at just a click of a button. This gives efficiency in dealing with large number of people.

) } export default About;
